textBeforeTable: OpenSceneGraph/trunk/include/osg/DisplaySettings Removed Added Unmodified Legend: src/osgViewer/View.cpp (modified) (8 diffs) src/osg/GraphicsContext.cpp (modified) (1 diff) src/osg/DisplaySettings.cpp (modified) (6 diffs) include/osg/GraphicsContext (modified) (2 diffs) include/osg/DisplaySettings (modified) (2 diffs) 5 modified Files: OpenSceneGraph/trunk Location: Added command line and env var support for setting the GLContextVersion, GLContextFlags and GLContextProfileMask to osg::DisplaySettings?. Added support for s/getGLContextVersion(), s/getGLContextFlags() and s/getGLContextProfileMask() to osg::DisplaySettings?. Moved the handling of DisplaySettings? into Traits constructor. Added glContexVersion, glContextFlags and glContextProfileMask members to osg::GraphicsContext::Traits to support GL3 graphics context creation.
